select s.space_id_ as "spaceId" ,s.area_id_ as "areaId" ,s.space_serial as "spaceSerial" ,s.car_license as "carLicense" ,s.space_status as "spaceStatus" ,s.created_time as "createdTime" ,date_format(s.created_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as "createdTime" ,r.name as "name" ,r.phone as "phone" from tb_parking_space_rental r left join tb_parking_space s on r.space_id_ = s.space_id_ left join tb_parking_area a on s.area_id_ = a.area_id_ where r.record_status = '1' and approval_status != '-1'
and r.account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT tt.* FROM ( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_parking_space_rental re WHERE re.approval_status = '6' AND re.end_time > NOW() AND re.account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS 'spaceTotal', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_parking_record r WHERE r.parking_status = '1' AND r.record_status = '1' AND r.account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS 'useSpace' FROM DUAL ) tt
